Mechanical Lloyd Company Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị na Accra nke na-ere ụgbọala na ngwá ọrụ ugbo na ọrụ. Edepụtara ha na ndepụta ngwaahịa nke Ghana Stock Exchange, GSE All-Share Index
Ewebara Mechanical Lloyd na 7 Ọgọst 1970 wee depụta ya na mgbanwe ngwaahịa na 10 Mee 1994..
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ngalaba ahịa ụgbọ ala atọ, na-ekpuchi ụgbọala Ford, BMW, na Massey Ferguson, na ngalaba ọrụ nke anọ.
